extension.title: 4. Browser Extension
extension.description: The WoT browser extension provides Web of Trust functionality for Nostr applications. By installing and using the extension, you agree to the following terms:

functionality.title: Functionality
functionality.description: The extension calculates trust scores based on your social graph and the Nostr protocol. Trust scores are subjective measures based on social connections and should not be considered absolute indicators of trustworthiness.

updates.title: Updates
updates.description: The extension may receive automatic updates through your browser's extension store. These updates may include bug fixes, security patches, and new features.

accuracy.description: Trust calculations are based on publicly available Nostr data. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the data or calculations.
